desc: The course includes strategies and materials for teaching English to speakers of other languages. Students learn strategies that focus on the development of listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills in English language learners. Students review materials appropriate for non-native English speakers and create their own materials and lesson plans. Fulfills EDUC 382: Human Relations requirement. Required field experience component. Prerequisites: EDUC 246 and EDUC 330 or EDUC 260. Offered annually during Interim.
name: Teaching ESL K-12
notes: The on-campus portion of this class will meet in TOH 112.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: EDUC 246 and EDUC 330 or EDUC 260. Offered annually during Interim.
title: Teaching ESL, K-12
